docs.snippet: The black and white Angus, the second bovine to escape in Queens in recent months, got out of a holding area and wandered the streets before it was corralled at York College in Jamaica....
docs.lead_paragraph: The black and white Angus, the second bovine to escape in Queens in recent months, got out of a holding area and wandered the streets before it was corralled at York College in Jamaica.
docs.abstract: Authorities capture black and white Angus bull that had escaped its holding area near Jamaica, Queens; bull, which attracted significant attention while wandering through neighborhood, is picked up by comedian Jon Stewart for transportation to Farm Sanctuary shelter in Watkins Glen, NY.

headline.main: Bull in Queens Is Captured, and Jon Stewart Chauffeurs It to Freedom
headline.print_headline: Lost Bull in Queens Is Captured, and Escorted to Freedom by Jon Stewart
